message: Let's split the money equally. It's fair and simple.
You got a better offer, take it or leave it!
I propose we divide the money with a slight imbalance in my favor. I believe this is a fair compromise.
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'm not falling for it!
I suggest we adjust our offers slightly. This proposal aims for a balance while respecting the value of your gain in each round.
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share now!
Considering the inflation adjustments, I propose a more equitable distribution that reflects the diminishing value of the money over time.
